attributes.action: Make available in England, Wales and Northern Ireland a similar scheme to one recently launched in Scotland whereby £10k interest free loans are available to improve your homes green credentials.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Scottish Parliament has recently announced a scheme where Homeowners are able to borrow up to £10k for things like loft insulation and Eco-appliances. Once again Scotland gets a brilliant idea actioned and the rest of us have to make do.
